channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Job Portal
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP Job Portal

item.title: CVE-2023-4490|2024-08-02T07:31:06.226Z -- unknown -- wp%20job%20portal
item.description: The WP Job Portal WordPress plugin before 2.0.6 does not sanitise and escape a parameter before using it in a SQL statement, leading to a SQL injection exploitable by unauthenticated users
